issue.title: [Python] Provide a "feather" alias in the dataset API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8416](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8416). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I don't know what the plans are on the C++ side (ARROW-7586), but for 0.17, I think it would be nice if we can at least support `ds.dataset(..., format="feather")` (instead of needing to tell people to do `ds.dataset(..., format="ipc")` to read feather files).
